alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Newport; Southeast Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 6:10PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Plymouth, southern Bristol, northeastern Newport, southeastern Providence and Bristol Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 610 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Berkley to near East Providence. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... New Bedford, Fall River, Taunton, East Providence, Dartmouth, Bristol, Marion, Middleborough, Somerset, Portsmouth, Barrington, Fairhaven, Swansea, Tiverton, Westport, Seekonk, Rehoboth, Warren, Lakeville, and Acushnet. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. These storms may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.
